header.title: Introduction

chapter.p: The diameter application is an implementation of the Diameter protocol as defined by RFC 3588. It supports arbitrary Diameter applications by allowing a client to specify the commands and AVP's to be supported and has support for implementing all roles defined in the RFC: client, server and agent.
